languages.text: "Я говорил тебе, Эви. От нас столько всего скрывают. Чванливые наставники, святые братья и сестры — что они дали нам? Только ворох сказок и бесполезных наставлений", {n}— голос стоящего к вам спиной мужчины звучит почти нежно. Говорящий склонен над пленником в богатой одежде и не обращает внимания ни на что вокруг.{/n}

"I told you, Evvie. They are hiding so much from us. Arrogant mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man standing with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front of him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я говорил тебе, Эви. От нас столько всего скрывают. Чванливые наставники, святые братья и сестры — что они дали нам? Только ворох сказок и бесполезных наставлений", {n}— голос стоящего к вам спиной мужчины звучит почти нежно. Говорящий склонен над пленником в богатой одежде и не обращает внимания ни на что вокруг.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I told you, Evie. They are hiding so much from us. Conceited mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a clutter of fibs and useless edifications." {n}The voice of the man sitting with his back to you sounds almost soft. Oblivious to his surroundings, he is leaned over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

"I told you, Evie. They are hiding so much from us. Conceited mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a clutter of fibs and useless edifications." {n}The voice of the man sitting with his back to you sounds almost soft. Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man sitting with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front before him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

"I told you, Evvie. They are hiding so much from us. Arrogant mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man sitting with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front before him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

languages.text: “我早就告诉过你，小艾，他们对我们隐瞒了太多真相。那些傲慢的导师，还有道貌岸然的兄弟姐妹，他们给过我们什么？除了无数谎言与没用的训诫之外，什么都没有。”{n}一个男人站在那里，背对着你，他的声音听起来几乎算得上是温文尔雅。他无暇顾及眼前的一切，全部注意力都集中在面前穿着华贵服装的囚犯身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I told you, Evvie. They are hiding so much from us. Arrogant mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man standing with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front of him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我早就告诉过你，小艾，他们对我们隐瞒了太多真相。那些傲慢的导师，还有道貌岸然的兄弟姐妹，他们给过我们什么？除了无数谎言与没用的训诫之外，什么都没有。”{n}一个男人站在那里，背对着你，他的声音听起来几乎算得上是温文尔雅。他无暇顾及眼前的一切，全部注意力都集中在面前穿着华贵服装的囚犯身上。{/n}

languages.text: 「言っただろう、エヴィー。奴らは我々から多くのことを隠している。傲慢な指導者、聖なる兄弟姉妹…奴らが我々に何を与えてくれたというのだ？そこには、嘘と無意味な戒めしかないのだ」{n}背を向けて立っている男の声は、ほとんど柔らかそうに聞こえる。目の前にあるもの以外何も気にせず、彼は高価な服を着た囚人に寄りかかっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I told you, Evvie. They are hiding so much from us. Arrogant mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man standing with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front of him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言っただろう、エヴィー。彼らは我らに多くのことを隠している。傲慢な指導者、聖なる同胞…彼らが我らに何を与えてくれたというのだ？そこには、嘘と無意味な戒めしかないのだ」{n}背を向けて座っている男の声は、どこか柔らかに聞こえるほどだ。目前のこと以外は無頓着のように、彼は高価な服に身をつつんだ囚人の上に身を乗り出した。{/n}
「言っただろう、エヴィー。奴らは我々から多くのことを隠している。傲慢な指導者、聖なる兄弟姉妹…奴らが我々に何を与えてくれたというのだ？そこには、嘘と無意味な戒めしかないのだ」{n}背を向けて立っている男の声は、ほとんど柔らかそうに聞こえる。目の前にあるもの以外何も気にせず、彼は高価な服を着た囚人に寄りかかっている。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe es Euch gesagt, Evvie. Sie verbergen so viel vor uns. Arrogante Mentoren, heilige Brüder und Schwestern – was haben sie uns jemals gegeben? Nichts außer einem Haufen Lügen und nutzlosen Warnungen." {n}Die Stimme des Mannes, der dir den Rücken zuwendet, klingt fast sanft. Er schenkt seiner Umgebung keinerlei Beachtung, während er sich über einen Gefangenen in teurer Kleidung beugt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I told you, Evvie. They are hiding so much from us. Arrogant mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man standing with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front of him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe es Euch gesagt, Evvie. Sie verbergen so viel vor uns. Arrogante Mentoren, heilige Brüder und Schwestern – was haben sie uns jemals gegeben? Nichts außer einem Haufen Lügen und nutzlosen Warnungen." {n}Die Stimme des Mannes, der dir den Rücken zuwendet, klingt fast sanft. Er schenkt seiner Umgebung keinerlei Beachtung, während er sich über einen Gefangenen in teurer Kleidung beugt.{/n}

languages.text: « Je te l'avais dit, Evvie. Ils nous cachent tellement de choses. Mentors arrogants, frères et sœurs saints... que nous ont-ils apporté ? Rien qu'un tas de mensonges et de sermons inutiles. » {n}La voix de l'homme qui vous tourne le dos vous paraît presque douce. Sans se soucier nullement de ce qui l'entoure, il est penché sur un prisonnier richement vêtu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I told you, Evvie. They are hiding so much from us. Arrogant mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man standing with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front of him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je te l'avais dit, Evvie. Ils nous cachent tellement de choses. Mentors arrogants, frères et sœurs saints... que nous ont-ils apporté ? Rien qu'un tas de mensonges et de sermons inutiles. » {n}La voix de l'homme assis dos à vous paraît presque douce. Sans se soucier nullement de ce qui l'entoure, il est penché sur un prisonnier richement vêtu.{/n}

languages.text: «Te lo advertí, Evvie. Nos ocultan demasiado. Mentores arrogantes, hermanos y hermanas sagrados... ¿qué nos han dado? Solo mentiras y reprimendas». {n}La voz del hombre que te da la espalda es casi suave. Como si no fuera consciente de todo lo que hay frente a él, se inclina sobre un prisionero vestido con ropa cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I told you, Evvie. They are hiding so much from us. Arrogant mentors, holy brothers and sisters — what have they ever given us? Nothing but a pile of fibs and useless admonitions." {n}The voice of the man standing with his back to you sounds almost soft. Heedless of everything but what is in front of him, he leans over a prisoner dressed in expensive clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Te lo advertí, Evvie. Nos ocultan demasiado. Mentores arrogantes, hermanos y hermanas sagrados... ¿qué nos han dado? Solo mentiras y reprimendas». {n}La voz del hombre que te da la espalda es casi suave. Como si no fuera consciente de todo lo que hay frente a él, se inclina sobre un prisionero vestido con ropa cara.{/n}

languages.text: "Sana demiştim Evvie. Bizden çok şey saklıyorlar. Kibirli yönderler, kutsal rahip ve rahibeler bize şimdiye kadar ne verdi? Bir yığın palavra ve faydasız nasihatten başka hiçbir şey." {n}Sırtı sana dönük duran adamın sesi âdeta yumuşak geliyor. Önünde durandan başka hiçbir şeye aldırmadan, pahalı giysiler giymiş bir mahkûmun üzerine eğiliyor.{/n}
